description:
CryptoX F.C. is the world's first football club fully integrated with blockchain technology, offering an unparalleled opportunity for fans and investors to actively shape the club's future. Built on the powerful MultiversX blockchain, CryptoX F.C. merges football tradition with cutting-edge innovation, creating a decentralized ecosystem driven by the CRX utility token.

Unique NFTs: Own a piece of history with our Investors NFTs, offering dividends and exclusive rights, or enhance your fan experience with Supporters NFTs featuring AR/VR match content and VIP access.
